00048 #define J2K_CP_CSTY_PRT 0x01
00049 #define J2K_CP_CSTY_SOP 0x02
00050 #define J2K_CP_CSTY_EPH 0x04
00051 #define J2K_CCP_CSTY_PRT 0x01
00052 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_LAZY 0x01     
00053 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_RESET 0x02    
00054 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_TERMALL 0x04  
00055 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_VSC 0x08      
00056 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_PTERM 0x10    
00057 #define J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_SEGSYM 0x20   
00058 #define J2K_CCP_QNTSTY_NOQNT 0
00059 #define J2K_CCP_QNTSTY_SIQNT 1
00060 #define J2K_CCP_QNTSTY_SEQNT 2

00066 #define J2K_MS_SOC 0xff4f       
00067 #define J2K_MS_SOT 0xff90       
00068 #define J2K_MS_SOD 0xff93       
00069 #define J2K_MS_EOC 0xffd9       
00070 #define J2K_MS_SIZ 0xff51       
00071 #define J2K_MS_COD 0xff52       
00072 #define J2K_MS_COC 0xff53       
00073 #define J2K_MS_RGN 0xff5e       
00074 #define J2K_MS_QCD 0xff5c       
00075 #define J2K_MS_QCC 0xff5d       
00076 #define J2K_MS_POC 0xff5f       
00077 #define J2K_MS_TLM 0xff55       
00078 #define J2K_MS_PLM 0xff57       
00079 #define J2K_MS_PLT 0xff58       
00080 #define J2K_MS_PPM 0xff60       
00081 #define J2K_MS_PPT 0xff61       
00082 #define J2K_MS_SOP 0xff91       
00083 #define J2K_MS_EPH 0xff92       
00084 #define J2K_MS_CRG 0xff63       
00085 #define J2K_MS_COM 0xff64       
00086 #define J2K_MS_CBD 0xff78       
00087 #define J2K_MS_MCC 0xff75       
00088 #define J2K_MS_MCT 0xff74       
00089 #define J2K_MS_MCO 0xff77       
00091 #define J2K_MS_UNK 0            
00093 /* UniPG>> */
00094 #ifdef USE_JPWL
00095 #define J2K_MS_EPC 0xff68       
00096 #define J2K_MS_EPB 0xff66       
00097 #define J2K_MS_ESD 0xff67       
00098 #define J2K_MS_RED 0xff69       
00099 #endif /* USE_JPWL */

00101 #define J2K_MS_SEC 0xff65

00112 typedef enum J2K_STATUS {
00113         J2K_STATE_NONE  =  0x0000, 
00114         J2K_STATE_MHSOC  = 0x0001, 
00115         J2K_STATE_MHSIZ  = 0x0002, 
00116         J2K_STATE_MH     = 0x0004, 
00117         J2K_STATE_TPHSOT = 0x0008, 
00118         J2K_STATE_TPH    = 0x0010, 
00119         J2K_STATE_MT     = 0x0020, 
00120         J2K_STATE_NEOC   = 0x0040, 
00122         J2K_STATE_EOC    = 0x0100, 
00123         J2K_STATE_ERR    = 0x8000  
00124 } J2K_STATUS;
